title: MoonChain: lightweight, fast, and integrated infrastructure
subtitle: Built for large-scale financial applications, MoonChain delivers high performance, low cost, and full integration with the MoonRise ecosystem.

integration.title: Integration
list: Direct connection with MoonWallet and MoonBuy
Support for stablecoins and tokenized assets

quote.text: “Every application depends on a solid foundation. MoonChain is that foundation.”
quote.description: Engineered to operate at scale with lightness, security, and full ecosystem integration.
